title.narrative: Defending the righs of Human Rights Defenders: Core support for the implimentation of their strategic plan 2018-2022

description.narrative: There is shrinking of civic space which is manifested in different ways including enactment and enforcement of the cybercrime statistics and information laws since 2015 which among other things limit freedom of expression and opinion; banning on all pol itical activities (democratization rallies) which were used in the past as platform to raise civic awareness amongst public members; and limitation of freedom of press due to alleged censorship fining and banning on some of the media outlets; hijacking and mysterious missing of HRDs. The worst cases of violations included direct attacks to outspoken politicians and bloggers; and generally such threats and intimidations of HRDs as making up some cases against them intimating that they are not citizens of Tan zania. The funds will contribute the achievements of Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition's key objactives and results of their strategic plan 2018- 2022: The overal objective of their strategy is to improve liv ing and working environments of Human rights Defenders in the country. To realize this goal five key results areas have been designed: I. THRDC Members and the general public are mobilized and are effectively addressing human rights protection issues; II. THRDC members and relevant stakeholders are empowered and efficiently engaging in protection and promotion of the HRDs? rights; III. The national human rights mechanisms on HRDs are effectively reformed and being implemented in favor of HRDs; IV. HRDs? sec urity protection and performances are improved; and V. The performance and sustainability of THRDC is enhanced. The primary beneficiaries are human rights defenders general public will also benefit from these intitaives. The implementing organization is Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition with their members. THRDC has about 160 members comprisi ng of both individuals and organizations that work towards enhancing security and protection of HRDs.
